title: Foreign Minister holds discussions with the Secretary General of the Arab League
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, held Monday talks with the Secretary General of the Arab League, Mr Ahmed Abu al-Gheit, in anticipation of the extraordinary session of the Arab League Council devoted to the examination of the Arab response to the Israeli crimes in occupied al-Quds.
The two parties stressed the necessity of reviving the Arab-Muslim solidarity in support to our Palestinian brothers and preservation of our sacred religious places.
